version_description:
- Payroll admins can now add shift differentials to applicable earnings.
- 1095-c tax forms will be available when they are issued during tax season.
- Stability and performance enhancements.

- Checkstub notifications are now available for employees! Use the settings option after logging in to opt in.
- Bug fixes and stability enhancements
- Stability improvements

- Bug fixes
- Security enhancements

- Security enhancements
- Bug Fixes
This release fixes an issue some users were experiencing when trying to view their checkstub.

Welcome to the all new Paychex Flex experience! This latest version includes the following enhancements and much more:

-Touch ID authentication
-Access to all reports, including custom and on-demand reports
-Ability to edit employee profiles<

Several enhancements with this release:
-Administrators can now edit Federal, State, and SUI agency taxes for their employees
-Retirement compliance test results are now available for quick reference
-Employees can view their retirement plan's fu

Exciting changes with this release:
• Review payroll totals and submit payroll for up to 10 companies at a time.
• View withholdings and taxes on a worker's check (Federal, State, and Local).
• Find and add inactive or terminated workers to payro

Employees can now upload profile images to personalize their account! Administrators can also upload company images for their employees that will display next to each record in the People list. In addition, administrators can now edit recurring pay types,

We now support Face ID authentication for iPhone X!

Also with this release, we'll be introducing the new AccountantHQ - a streamlined dashboard experience for CPAs and Accountants to manage their clients' payroll, reporting, and HR data, view their

Administrators now have the ability to edit custom fields, along with the ability to edit local taxes for Pennsylvania and Ohio.
Employees with Time & Attendance can now cancel time off requests.
Performance improvements and minor bug fixes

-Employees can now view all their itemized earnings, withholding, and deductions for a given pay period.
-Administrators can now review their company's Turnover Rate, Headcount, New Hires and Terminations.
-We've also added a "What's New?" section s

-A new Employee Listing report is now part of the Live Reports library
-Added the ability to create, calculate, and edit checks from Payroll
-Minor bug fixes

Admins can now manage and edit Company level information and settings from the Paychex Flex app. This includes managing your organizations, locations, positions, tax information, bank accounts, and pay components. Admins also have the ability to create an

The app now supports multi-factor authentication and will use the security settings you choose during account registration. In addition, Payroll has been updated to make pay entry even easier from your device, and administrators can now send invites to th

• Access to our New Human Resources dashboard, which includes HR analytics, an HR events calendar, best in class learning management system, and completely redesigned performance management process.
• Introduction of approvals, which provides a simple

• Access to our New Human Resources dashboard, which includes HR analytics, an HR events calendar, best in class learning management system, and completely redesigned performance management process.
• Introduction of approvals, which provides a simple

- Simplified the way you add new employees into the system.
- Minor bug fixes.

-Administrators can now approve employee direct deposit changes before they take effect.
-Agency and Vendor maintenance is now available from Company Settings.
-Ability to switch to your personal account (My Account) has been moved to the user menu
Minor app updates and bug fixes.

New to the Paychex Flex app – a revamped Time & Attendance experience will provide employees a simpler way to view and manage their time card, submit punches, and access a calendar with their upcoming time off requests. In addition, minor bug fixes ha

New to the Paychex Flex app – administrators of multiple companies can now easily search and manage employee information across all of their companies from a unified People list. In addition, minor bug fixes have been applied to ensure continued improveme

New to the Paychex Flex app – administrators can now set up approvals for employee personal information changes, allowing opportunity to review prior to the changes taking effect. In addition, minor bug fixes have been applied to ensure continued improvem

New to the Paychex Flex app – supervisors can now document their conversations with their employees and stay organized. Administrators can maintain all their documents electronically, allowing for easy sharing and maintenance. In addition, minor bug fixes
New to the Paychex Flex app – general performance and UI enhancements have been made to ensure continued improvement to the experience.

New to the Paychex Flex app - minor bug fixes have been made to ensure continued improvement to the experience.

New to the Paychex Flex app - administrators and employees can now view their company's org structure. Quickly look up a co-worker's supervisor, peers, and direct reports all from the People section. Please note this feature is only available to employees
New to the Paychex Flex app - minor bug fixes and enhancements have been made to ensure continued improvement to the experience.

New to the Paychex Flex app - an updated notification list makes it easier to view and manage your notifications. Minor bug fixes and enhancements have been made to ensure continued improvement to the experience.

New to the Paychex Flex app - Apple Watch support! Employees can now view their most recent check stub information from their Apple Watch. In addition, minor bug fixes and enhancements have been made to ensure continued improvement to the experience.
